io.cettia.asity.bridge.vertx2

Class AsityWebSocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.asity.bridge.vertx2.AsityWebSocketHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.http.ServerWebSocket>

    public class AsityWebSocketHandler
extends Object
implements org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.http.ServerWebSocket>
    Handler to process ServerWebSocket into VertxServerWebSocket. 

     httpServer.websocketHandler(new AsityWebSocketHandler().onwebsocket(http -> {}));
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
